content: {"name": "Friendship Park Senior Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Required: order your meal the day before by 12:00pm", "email": "", "url": "https://friendshipparktoledo.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2930 131st Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Toledo", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43611", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.7196763, "longitude": -83.4752741}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 936-3079", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Senior (Adults 60+) Grab & Go Meals"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A donation of $2.5 is accepted per meal"}]}
